ARABIC: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In fact each one of them wants to be given an unfurled scroll.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In fact every one of them wants to be given open books (like the prophets).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No indeed; each one of them desires that open letters be sent to each of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Is it that everyone of them wants to receive a heavenly book addressed to him personally?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Rather each one of them desires that he should be given open Books.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay, everyone of them desires that he should be given pages spread out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay; every one of them desires that he may be given pages spread out;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, every man of them desires to be -- given -- scrolls unrolled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but everyone of them desireth that he should be given open pages (from Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, everyone of them desires to have sheets of revelations unfolded before them --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Aye! every one of them desireth that: he should be vouchsafed scrolls expanded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But everyone of them desires to be given unrolled scriptures [from Allah]!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Forsooth, each one of them wants to be given scrolls (of revelation) spread out!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, everyone of them desires that he should be given pages spread out (coming from Allah with a writing that Islam is the right religion, and Muhammad SAW has come with the truth from Allah the Lord of the heavens and earth, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, each one of them desires to be given unrolled scrolls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Yet every one of them desires to be given scrolls unrolled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:52] Nay, but everyone of them desires to be given unrolled scrolls, from God, exalted be He, [enjoining them] to follow the Prophet (s), as they said [before], ‘And [even then] we will not believe your ascension until you bring down for us a book that we may read’ [Q. 17:93].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but everyone of them desireth that he should be given open pages (from Allah)) a book wherein is written his crimes and repentance, for they said: "bring us a book in which is written our crimes and repentance and we will believe in you".
